query.q: SERIES_SUM("M::`kubernetes`:(AVG(`pod`) AS `container 数量`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name}' and `namespace` = '#{namespace}' } BY `namespace`, `cluster_name_k8s`")
O::`kubelet_pod`:(LAST(`age`) AS `运行时长`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name}' and `namespace` = '#{namespace}' } BY `pod_name`
O::`kubernetes_services`:(LAST(`age`) AS `运行时长`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name}' and `namespace` = '#{namespace}' } BY `namespace`, `service_name`
O::`kubernetes_replica_sets`:(LAST(`age`) AS `运行时长`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name}' and `namespace` = '#{namespace}' } BY `deployment`, `replica_set_name`
M::`system`:(AVG(`load15_per_core`) AS `15分钟负载`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name}' and `cluster_name_k8s` != '' } BY `host`
M::`mem`:(AVG(`used`) AS `已使用内存`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name}'  and `cluster_name_k8s` != '' } BY `host`
M::`mem`:(AVG(`free`) AS `剩余内存`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name}'  and `cluster_name_k8s` != ''} BY `host`
M::`disk`:(AVG(`total`) AS `总磁盘空间`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name}'  and `cluster_name_k8s` != ''} BY `device`, `host`
M::`disk`:(AVG(`used`) AS `已使用磁盘空间`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name}'  and `cluster_name_k8s` != ''} BY `device`, `host`
M::`disk`:(AVG(`free`) AS `剩余磁盘空间`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name}'  and `cluster_name_k8s` != ''} BY `device`, `host`
SERIES_SUM("M::`kube_replicaset`:(AVG(`replicas_desired`) AS `副本 数量`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name}' and `namespace` = '#{namespace}' } BY `namespace`, `deployment`, `cluster_name_k8s`")
SERIES_SUM("M::`kube_replicaset`:(AVG(`replicas_ready`) AS `副本 数量`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name}' and `namespace` = '#{namespace}' } BY `namespace`, `deployment`, `cluster_name_k8s`")
